servinfo.title: ABS warning light or ESP® warning light does not turn ON for 2 – 3 sec. after ignition switch has turned ON

condition.ptxt: ABS warning light or ESP® warning light does not turn ON for 2 – 3 sec. after ignition switch has turned ON

ps.ptxt: ABS warning light circuit open (including check relay)

action.ptxt: Check system referring to ABS Warning Light Does Not Come ON at Ignition Switch ON or ESP® Warning Light Does Not Come ON at Ignition Switch ON .
